summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 Pieces Bouffant Caps with Buttons, Soft Unisex Stretch Headband Elastic Turban Headwrap with Ear Loop Holder Button (Black, Grey, Lake Blue, Royal Blue, Navy, Purple)
Review Date: 2021/02/26
Store: Geyoga
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Geyoga', 'Package Dimensions': '12.24 x 10.2 x 1 inches; 7.05 Ounces'}
Review Text: I bought these for my son who is on the autism spectrum.  Because of his sensory issues,  he hates the ear loops on his mask that he wears to school.  These are super comfortable and the mask loops can be moved to the side buttons.  I was a little concerned that he would get hot wearing a hat all day, but they are very lightweight and breathable.
Review Title: Very comfortable
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ImplantClean Dental Implant Toothbrush - for implants, bridges, fixed dentures, and gums - SOFT Bristles
Review Date: 2021/02/27
Store: IMPLANT & PERIO CARE
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'IMPLANT & PERIO CARE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Soft', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count'}
Review Text: It fell apart after a few uses
Review Title: Poor quality
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hair Scrunchies for Girls Hair Ties 7PCS Candy Color Hair Accessories Luminous Hair Scrunchies Bands Soft Elastic Scrunchies Satin Soft Hair Scruchy Natural Glow Only in the Dark Night Hair Accessories for Women and Girls
Review Date: 2021/03/02
Store: DOTKV
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Color': 'Yellow,Orange,Blue,Green,White,Purple', 'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'DOTKV', 'Hair Type': 'All, normal', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.33 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '194852280144'}
Review Text: I bought these for my daughter who loves cosmic bowling.  I thought these would be great for tying her hair up and would look nice under the blacklight.  They are made out of a fluffy chenille material that is super stretchy.  They look nice in regular light, but really shine under a black light.
Review Title: Glows under a blacklight
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3 Pieces Detangling Hairbrush Unicorn Plastic Massage Comb Paddle Hair Brush Unicorn Hair Detangler Brush for Women Girls Curly Straight Long Thin Soft Natural or Short Hair (Vivid Pattern)
Review Date: 2021/03/26
Store: Patelai
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Patelai', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Plastic', 'Special Feature': 'Detangling, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 4.7 x 1.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: I bought these for my daughter who loves unicorns.  She is also on the autism spectrum so she has a lot of sensory problems.  Brushing her hair can be a challenge because she hates when it pulls her hair.  These are a great idea because they are so comfortable.  The plastic bristles massage her scalp and the paddle shape smooths her hair without snagging.  Plus she loves the cool unicorn designs.
Review Title: Super cute
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Weiwey Extra Thick Dry Wipe, 100% Cotton, Unscented Cotton Tissues for Sensitive Skin (1 PACK-80PCS)
Review Date: 2021/03/31
Store: weiwey
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'weiwey', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Sheet Count': '80', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Cleansing', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.08 x 4.41 x 2.36 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '763347936332'}
Review Text: I bought these for a friend who does theater.  He has to wear a lot of pancake makeup that is kind of hard to remove.  These are so much better than regular makeup wipes because of the texture and strength.  He can use a dry one first off to wipe away a lot of it then another one with make up remover to clean off the rest.  Afterwards,  he can throw them out instead of trying to wash a dirty washcloth every time.
Review Title: Good for makeup removal
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: keystand 2 Pack baby wipes dispenser ,Wipes Case Fits up to 60/120 wipes,Paper towels Wipes Dispenser Baby Wipes Case,Carry-on Baby Wipe holder,Keep Wipe Fresh
Review Date: 2021/06/08
Store: keystand
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Keystand', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Product Benefits': 'Clean', 'Package Dimensions': '10.28 x 6.42 x 3.27 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0'}
Review Text: I bought this for my sister who is having a baby.  Her nursery has a black and white theme which kind of makes me feel like I am inside a domino,  but this fits in great.  A full sized refill pack of diaper wipes fits in it easily so there's no guesswork about how many to put inside.  The silicone lid ensures that it is airtight and the wipes don't dry out.  I mainly bought it for the big container,  but I really like the travel one that it came with too.  It's easy to fill and has a handle little handle for carrying it.
Review Title: Super cute
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner Kit - 8 Pairs Invisible Magnetic False Eyelashes and Black Eyeliner of 2 Tubes Sets, Auchois 3D Reusable Natural Look Fake Eyelashes, Faux Mink Lashes Pack
Review Date: 2021/07/27
Store: AUCHOIS
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUCHOIS', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Latex Free', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BME001'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:cb9b4f9df532525269b6bd626cc29f60]] I have heard horror stories about people accidentally gluing their eyes shut with eyelash adhesive.  My sister wanted to try some for her wedding and I thought this would be a safer option.  It's as easy as applying eyeliner.  The magnets on the back of the lashes automatically stick to the eyeliner and stay in place until you remove them.  They seem well made and look natural.  The set includes 8 pairs of lashes, a case with a mirror,  the special eyeliner,  and even a pair of tweezers made for eyelashes.
Review Title: So easy to use
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EarthWise Aromatics Lemon Balm - 100% Natural - 1 lb (16oz)
Review Date: 2021/09/20
Store: EarthWise Aromatics
Product Description: ['16 oz of Lemon Balm Herb']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EarthWise Aromatics', 'Scent': 'Lemon', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Unit Count': '16 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.3 x 9.72 x 2.95 inches; 15.84 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'EarthWise Aromatics'}
Review Text: I love lemon balm and I even grow my own.  I wanted to buy some to get me through the winter,  but this is not it.  I have no idea what it is, but it tastes like grass.  It's definitely not lemon balm.  At least I didn't spend too much on it.
Review Title: Gross
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nature's Oil (USP Grade) Vegetable Glycerin 99.7% (10 lbs) 1 Gallon
Review Date: 2021/09/22
Store: Nature's Oil
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': "Nature's Oil", 'Item Weight': '10.49 Pounds', 'Item Volume': '1 Gallons', 'Percentage assay': '99.7', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '12.5 x 11.2 x 5.6 inches; 10.49 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SturdyHH21', 'Manufacturer': "Nature's Oil"}
Review Text: I bought this for my homemade herbal tinctures.  Unfortunately,  the top was damaged and leaking.
Review Title: Poorly designed top
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Secret Original Shower Fresh Scent Women's Invisible Solid Ph Balanced Antiperspirant and Deodorant, 2.6 Ounce
Review Date: 2022/02/08
Store: Secret
Product Description: ["Its the one you've known and trusted for years for odor and wetness protection. pH-balanced to work with your body's natural chemistry, Secret Original Invisible Solid helps you stay confident during the day. Trust the odor and wetness-fighting protection of Secret Original Strong Enough for a Woman. Invisible Solid: Invisible protection, goes on dry."]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Secret', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '2.6 Ounce', 'Item Volume': '2.6 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.01 x 1.42 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'P&G'}
Review Text: I'm not big on fragrances especially artificial,  perfumey stuff.  This has a nice clean scent that compliments my natural smell.  It keeps me dry and comfy even on very hot days.
Review Title: Nice scent
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Key Preferences and Trends:**

- **Comfort and Sensory Sensitivity**: Frequent purchases of lightweight, breathable items for individuals with autism. Headwear and hair accessories are chosen for their comfort and sensory-friendly features.

- **Child-Centric Products**: Multiple transactions are centered around products for children, specifically accessories that appeal to their interests (e.g., unicorns, bright colors) and sensory preferences.

- **Quality Concerns**: A notable trend of dissatisfaction with product quality, particularly related to durability (e.g., dental toothbrush and balm) indicates a preference for well-made, reliable goods.

- **Practicality in Personal Care**: Purchases reflect a focus on usefulness, such as effective makeup removal and easy-to-use beauty items (e.g., magnetic eyelashes), indicating a value for efficient beauty solutions.

- **Health and Hygiene Focus**: Interest in personal care items that cater to skin sensitivity and comfort (e.g., unscented wipes, deodorant without artificial fragrances) shows a preference for gentle, effective products.

- **Natural Products**: Interest in herbal and natural ingredients displayed through purchases like plant-based glycerin and lemon balm highlights a trend towards organic or natural solutions.

Overall, this person displays a strong inclination towards comfort, practicality, and products that cater to specific sensory needs.

target_interaction.title: It didn't work for me
target_interaction.text: It didn't work for my issue,  but it was kind of a long shot anyway
target_interaction.title_meta: INDIO Court Case Oil by 7 Sisters of New Orleans 1/2 fl. oz. (14.7ml)
features: Ease your way through the justice system by wearing 7 Sisters Court Case Oil as your perfume whenever you are consulting with attorneys or going into court before a judge or jury.
description: Ease your way through the justice system by wearing 7 Sisters Court Case Oil as your perfume whenever you are consulting with attorneys or going into court before a judge or jury.
